title: AttributeError: module 'torch' has no attribute '_TensorBase'
body_html:
My system is:
ubuntu 16.04
Im using pytorch 0.4 (installed it via conda)
cuda 9.0
python 3.X
anaconda 3

it sounds like it does not have the _TensorBase.

When I run the following code:

---> 11     if isinstance(data, t._TensorBase):
     12         return data.cpu().numpy()

I receive this error

AttributeError: module 'torch' has no attribute '_TensorBase'

body:
My system is:
ubuntu 16.04
Im using pytorch 0.4 (installed it via conda)
cuda 9.0
python 3.X
anaconda 3

it sounds like it does not have the _TensorBase.

When I run the following code:

```
---> 11     if isinstance(data, t._TensorBase):
     12         return data.cpu().numpy()
```

I receive this error

AttributeError: module 'torch' has no attribute '_TensorBase'
